text:

text:
My technical skills span across multiple domains:

- Frontend: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and crafting modern UI/UX designs using Figma.
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, RESTful APIs, and building scalable server-side architectures.
- AI & Machine Learning: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, prompt engineering, and integrating large language models (LLMs).
- Blockchain & Web3: Solidity, smart contract development, and building decentralized applications (dApps).
- Mobile Development: React Native and Flutter for cross-platform mobile app development.
- Design & 3D: Figma for designing intuitive interfaces and Blender for 3D modeling and creative visual assets.

And if you're wondering about my superpower: I'm a ridiculously fast learner ‚Äî I can pick up new technologies quicker than you can finish your coffee!

text: Beyond coding, I enjoy trekking, hiking, and going on long rides to reconnect with nature and find fresh inspiration. I love reading novels and books that expand my perspective, as well as binge-watching series and movies to relax and recharge. I also play the piano, explore new places whenever I can, and truly enjoy learning new skills from others. In my free time, you'll also find me trying out new foods, spending quality time with friends and family, or simply enjoying a good cup of coffee while brainstorming new ideas.

text:
I have collaborated with multiple startups and teams as a freelancer, delivering impactful computer vision solutions. Some of my key contributions include developing safety systems such as face detection-based attendance and verification, vehicle database systems with number plate recognition, and violence detection frameworks for enhanced security monitoring.

In addition to these, I‚Äôve worked on custom AI-powered tools tailored to specific business needs, helping early-stage companies bring their ideas to life with advanced technology.

Currently, I‚Äôm focused on building my own startup, where I aim to combine my experience in AI, full-stack development, and design to create products that make a real difference. I‚Äôm passionate about collaborating with other ambitious founders and creating tech solutions that positively impact society.

If you'd like to see a glimpse of the projects I've worked on, [ press the projects button below ]!
